name: Mississippi Mud Cake
instructions: Cream together butter, sugar, and cocoa.
Add eggs one at a time beating well after each egg.
Add flour, vanilla, and walnuts to the mixture.
Bake in greased 9 x 13 pan at 350 for 25 minutes.
Add 1/2 pound miniature marshmallows on top.  Return to oven for 3 minutes.

other.name: Frosting
ul: 1 egg plus enough water to make 1/3 cup
